special_text:
[+1]: Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
[-1]: Target player sacrifices an artifact. When they do, that player may return another target artifact card from their graveyard to the battlefield.
[-7]: Search your library and/or graveyard for up to three artifact cards and put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
